meanings.definition: The quality or state of being desirable.
meanings.sent1: The desirablenesses of the new car made it a popular choice among buyers.
meanings.sent2: The desirablenesses of the job included a high salary and flexible hours.
meanings.sent3: The desirablenesses of the vacation package were so tempting that they sold out quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her desirablenesses as a friend shone brightly in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The desirablenesses of the beachfront property were evident in its stunning ocean views.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is desired or sought after.
meanings.sent1: The desirablenesses of the limited edition sneakers led to long lines outside the store.
meanings.sent2: In the world of fashion, desirablenesses can change rapidly based on trends.
meanings.sent3: The desirablenesses of the rare stamp caused a bidding war at the auction.
meanings.sent4: His desirablenesses as a speaker made him a sought-after guest at events.
meanings.sent5: The desirablenesses of the antique vase were evident in its intricate design.
